Analyzing WealthHive's educational platform capabilities, I've identified a high-impact enhancement opportunity:

Consider implementing multimodal learning through voice and vision AI:

1. Voice Integration
- AI-narrated lessons
- Voice-interactive Q&A
- Verbal progress assessments
- Audio summaries of key concepts
- Voice-commanded navigation

2. Vision Enhancement
- Visual market analysis demos
- Interactive chart tutorials
- Real-time trading simulations
- Visual pattern recognition training
- Gesture-controlled interfaces

This aligns with WealthHive's GPT-4 and Claude capabilities (per wealthhive.json) and would significantly enhance the learning experience while maintaining the current 40/30/30 AI resource allocation.
